00099         protected function getCheckFailed($check) {
00100                 $checkFailed = $check['check'];
00101                 if(is_array($check['params'])) {
00102                         $checkFailed .= ";";
00103                         foreach($check['params'] as $key=>$value) {
00104                                 $checkFailed .= $key."::".$value.";";
00105                         }
00106                         $checkFailed = substr($checkFailed,0,strlen($checkFailed)-1);
00107                 }
00108                 return $checkFailed;
00109         }
